post.title: Rileyanne in Buttercup Field
post.content: I normally keep this blog clear of personal and political commentary, saving that talk for my personal blog on MSN Spaces. But this time I had to make an exception. Check out this awesome picture of my daughter Rileyanne in a field of buttercups. Isn’t she cute?
post.excerpt: I normally keep this blog clear of personal and political commentary, saving that talk for my personal blog on MSN Spaces. But this time I had to make an exception. Check out this awesome picture of my daughter Rileyanne in a field of buttercups. Isn’t she cute?

comments.name: Dmytro Lapshyn
comments.content: If you happened to see the “Full Metal Alchemist” anime, there was a character there, Hugh, who was notorious for constantly bragging about his small daughter

comments.name: Julianne Pierson
comments.content: Your wife must be SOME photographer! Ha ha ha Obviously VERY modest as well.
